parameter.name: headerPresent
parameter.description: Is there a header in the CSV payload ? Default is Absent

parameter.name: valueSeparator
parameter.description: Specify a value separator for CSV. Default is comma ( , )

parameter.name: skipHeader
parameter.description: Should the header row be skipped from the content ? Default if false

parameter.name: dataRowsToSkip
parameter.description: Number of data rows to skip. Default is 0

parameter.name: orderByColumn
parameter.description: Order the CSV content by the values of the given column

parameter.name: columnOrdering
parameter.description: Order columns ascending or descending. Default is ascending

parameter.name: columnsToSkip
parameter.description: Comma separated string of column indexes to skip. Leave blank to skip no columns

parameter.name: customHeader
parameter.description: Comma separated string of header to set as CSV payload header

parameter.name: customValueSeparator
parameter.description: Specify a value separator for CSV output. Default is comma ( , )
